name: OLU
description:
Details
  • Our main character Olu needs to collect water spirits that are scattered all over the jungle. Help him before he loses his power!
  • 2 game modes "Regular" and "Karma". The Karma game mode introduces the function of apples falling on top of you and killing you. Be careful!
Controls
  • Move using the arrow keys "↑↓→←" and wall jump to try and collect the orbs to keep the water spirit alive.
Credits

A college project that never saw the light of day so I'm posting it here just because =w=.
